Package GameModel

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Combinable
    Things that may be combined with other things
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Achievement
    An award for completing a specific task in the game
    Attack
    An Attack has damage properties and critical hit chance
    Attribute
    An attribute stores a value that has limits.
    Console
    A console for modifying things in the game
    Controls
    Takes care of the controls in the game
    FileIO
    Handles file input/output
    Game
    The main game
    Interface
    The GUI - menus
    Level
    A typical game level
    Menu
    A menu
    NPC
    Write a description of class NPC here.
    Objective
    An objective is a task that must be completed in order to progress in the game.
    Outfit
    An outfit consists of pieces of clothing
    PhysicalThing
    A physical thing exists in a physical world.
    Player
    A player in the game
    Quest
    A quest is an objective that consists of other objectives.
    Scenery
    Scenery is what makes the environment look pretty.
